Key Match Events: Seth Brown hit two home runs for the Athletics
Will Benson hit a go-ahead three-run homer for the Reds
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Athletics have belted seven home runs in the first two games of the three-game set
Others: Mason Miller recorded the save for the second straight night
Osvaldo Bido was cruising, retiring the first 13 batters he faced and allowing just one hit through six innings before running out of gas to start the seventh
